description:
A template to simplify integration of the PortableRazor Plugin for Xamarin
      and Windows in your app.
releaseNotes: First release of PortableRazor Starter Pack
summary:
PortableRazor makes it easy for Xamarin developers to create hybrid mobile
      applications in C# using the Razor templating engine, and ASP.NET MVC-style
      APIs and routing.

      PortableRazor StarterPack simplifies the integration of PortableRazor into
      cross-platform applications that share code through Portable Class Libraries
      (PCLs).  Code sharing is maximized through use of plugins that enable
      cross-platform management of static resources, like CSS, Javascript, and
      images) for use in hybrid webviews.

      This NuGet is primarily a meta-NuGet referencing these plugins:
      * PortableRazor - lightweight implementation of ASP.NET MVC APIs for mobile devices
      * PCLStorage - a portable set of local file IO APIs for .NET
      * EmbeddedResource Plugin for Xamarin and Windows - cross-platform access to embedded resources

      And a source implementation of PortableRazor.IHybridWebView for iOS, Android,
      and Windows Phone projects leveraging these plugins.

      When referenced from a PCL project, PortableRazor Starter Pack provides a
      simple Model, View, and Controller, as well as an example Starter class to
      demonstrate PortableRazor app initialization.
title: PortableRazor Starter Pack for Xamarin and Windows
